name: Vie et mort de l'Illustre Grigori Efimovitch Raspoutine

Also known as: Leben und Tod des illustren Grigori Jefimowitsch Rasputin
Production company: Ecole Nationale Supérieure des Arts Décoratifs (ENSAD)

description: A tragicomic tale about the life and whereabouts of a very mysterious character, Grigori Rasputin, who, from distant Siberia, made it to the Tzar's court at the beginning of the century. A coarse, rude, sexually obsessed monk who ...
